title: AALCO Golden Jubilee Conference kicks off in Colombo
content: Onlanka News – By Janaka Alahapperuma (Pix by: Sudath Silva) The 50th Anniversary Conference of the Asian African Legal Consultative Organization (AALCO) kicked off at the Cinnamon Lakeside Hotel in Colombo today on 27 June. This is the fourth time that the AALCO annual session is held in Colombo and Sri Lanka is privileged to…
